majorProjects.title: Aam – Usability Engineering Project
majorProjects.description: An immersive VR prototype for educational fruit identification, built around intuitive interactions and calm UX principles.
majorProjects.fullDescription: A conceptual VR experience centered on fruit learning, where users virtually interact with 3D fruit models, pluck them, inspect cross-sections, and gradually internalize identity cues. The project emphasizes gesture‑based interactions, minimal UI distractions, and an exploratory learning flow. The design went through multiple iterations, tested with a pilot group, and incorporated heuristic feedback to refine onboarding, error prevention, and interface consistency.
majorProjects.challenges: Designing intuitive VR fruit interactions: balancing realism with usability while maintaining high frame rates; guiding users without clutter; onboarding gesture controls in a calm, distraction‑free environment.
majorProjects.solution: Adopted heuristic iteration and prototyping: created minimal onboarding overlays, added color‑based growth/decay cues for fruits, introduced confirmation prompts, and visibly constrained interaction affordances. Optimized models and interactions to reduce motion sickness and maintain smooth performance.
majorProjects.results: Conducted a pilot study with a small group; questionnaire responses showed 100% found the interface simple and uncluttered, and majority found the app calming. Iterative feedback led to enhancements in user control, error recovery, and recognition over recall. The concept demonstrates feasibility and strong user acceptance.

majorProjects.title: Digimal – XR Virtual Pet Experience
majorProjects.description: An augmented reality (AR) virtual pet application designed to provide companionship and stress relief for users with lifestyle constraints.
majorProjects.fullDescription: Digimal is an AR-based virtual pet application that allows users to adopt, nurture, and interact with lifelike virtual pets in their real-world environment. The app aims to foster emotional connection and responsibility without the challenges of real pet ownership. Users can experience companionship through engaging animations and interactive care mechanics, all within an immersive AR setting.
majorProjects.challenges: Designing an engaging and emotionally resonant virtual pet experience that seamlessly integrates into the user's real-world environment, while ensuring intuitive interaction and maintaining user interest over time.
majorProjects.solution: Developed a dynamic pet evolution system where the pet's growth and behavior are influenced by user interactions, including health and affection levels. Implemented AR technology to place the pet in the user's environment, enhancing immersion and fostering a sense of companionship.
majorProjects.results: Successfully created a prototype that demonstrates the potential of AR in providing virtual companionship. The app's design encourages regular interaction, promoting emotional connection and stress relief for users with limited time or space for real pets.

majorProjects.title: Mehndi - Sand Animation
majorProjects.description: An experimental sand animation film visualising a traditional Rajasthani folk song about longing, created through hand-crafted frame-by-frame processes.
majorProjects.challenges: Selecting a folk song that was emotionally powerful yet not widely known; navigating verse-by-verse translation from Marwari without any team members speaking the language; learning and controlling the sand medium for the first time under tight time constraints; coordinating a near 24-hour animation schedule with a single camera setup; and integrating live-action performance footage with abstract sand visuals in a coherent narrative flow.
majorProjects.solution: Conducted field research at Mehrangarh Fort to collaborate directly with a traditional singer, recorded multiple performances, and shortlisted the song with the strongest emotional core. Developed storyboards for each verse and filler, drawing from mehndi motifs and Rajasthani visual traditions to ground the style. Set up a dark-room lightbox studio and worked in rotating shifts to keep animation continuous. Prioritized 'quality over quantity' by trimming weaker shots and focusing on clear, expressive movements. Intercut sand animation with performance footage of Pappu Ram to retain authenticity while enhancing the emotional arc.
majorProjects.results: The teaser for Mehndi was screened at the end of Prof. Delwyn’s talk, “Hand-Crafted Animation,” at IIT Jodhpur, where it received strong audience appreciation. The project strengthened the team’s understanding of hand-made, analogue animation and the value of patience in frame-by-frame work. It also reinforced the importance of field research, collaboration with local artists, and embracing visible traces of the maker’s hand as an aesthetic strength in an era dominated by digital and AI-generated imagery.

majorProjects.title: ARuler - Usability Engineering Study
majorProjects.description: A usability engineering project analyzing and redesigning an ARuler Android app to improve user experience and interface clarity.
majorProjects.fullDescription: ARuler is an augmented reality measuring tool built for Android devices using ARCore. This usability engineering study identified key usability issues through user testing, including confusing icons, unclear navigation, and poor labeling. The redesigned version proposed solutions like clearer iconography, undo and clear buttons, clipping microinteractions, and improved labeling to enhance intuitiveness and reduce task friction. The project involved pilot studies, pain point analysis, and iterative UI redesigns based on user feedback.
majorProjects.challenges: Identifying and addressing usability issues in an existing AR app that caused user confusion and reduced task efficiency.
majorProjects.solution: Conducted user testing to identify pain points, then redesigned the interface with clearer iconography, better labeling, and intuitive controls.
majorProjects.results: The redesigned interface significantly improved user comprehension and task completion rates, with positive feedback on ease of use.

majorProjects.title: Random Rampage - VR Game
majorProjects.description: VR boss-fight prototype featuring sword-based combat against mythic bosses.
majorProjects.fullDescription: Designed and prototyped a room-scale VR fighting game where players study enemy strengths and weaknesses and defeat bosses using a sword in contained arenas. The process covered brainstorming, game design, a reward–punishment loop, character concepts blending Eastern and Western mythic cues, and a storyboard to structure levels. Delivered a Unity vertical slice for one level using free Sketchfab models and Freesound audio, paired with a hand-drawn title treatment and cut‑scene direction in a gritty calligraphic style.
majorProjects.challenges: Designing unique boss behaviors and balancing difficulty progression in a VR environment while minimizing motion sickness and ensuring performance with free assets.
majorProjects.solution: Implemented a tunnel vision effect during movement, defined a clear reward–punishment loop, gave each boss distinct strengths/weaknesses, constrained arenas for readability, and tuned timing for sword attacks and counters
majorProjects.results: Successfully developed and showcased a full prototype level with functioning combat mechanics, environmental storytelling, and a stylized visual identity. Received positive feedback from academic reviewers and peers for creative world-building and immersion.

otherWorks.title: Who VR - VR Film
otherWorks.description: A location-shot 360° coming-of-age VR short film exploring the theme of solitude through spatial storytelling and sound.
otherWorks.fullDescription: End‑to‑end production covering concept, script, character development, shot planning, on‑location filming on various locations, and post that included stitching, editing, color, and a spatial audio mix; delivered as an immersive VR viewing experience with poster and deliverables documented.
otherWorks.challenges: Maintaining viewer comfort and horizon stability during moving platform shots, handling stitch seams and exposure shifts, and capturing clean location audio in busy outdoor settings.
otherWorks.solution: Previsualized shot types and lighting plans guided stable monopod placements, while an ambisonic workflow and careful post stitching/color balanced the scenes for immersive presence.
otherWorks.results: A cohesive VR documentary slice with clear narrative beats, lake‑side visuals, thorough storyboard coverage, and spatial audio that anchors attention and presence throughout the experience.

otherWorks.title: Shape Chase: Zero-Cost Playground  Game
otherWorks.description: A low-cost, movement-based educational game designed for 5th standard students that turns NCERT geometry concepts on shapes and angles into an engaging playground experience through play, reasoning, and physical interaction.

otherWorks.title: Rasta La Vista: Board Game
otherWorks.description: A modular, hex-tile board game that teaches players of all ages how to plan travel across India by simulating real public transport trade-offs through strategic route building and resource management.

otherWorks.title: Fashion In Motion
otherWorks.description: A six-image fashion series that visually tracks a character’s descent from reality into psychedelic chaos, using surreal settings, distorted forms, and unrestrained styling to depict an unhinged state of mind.

labWorks.title: Ghanta Ghar — Streets in Monochrome
labWorks.description: A black and white street photography collection tracing light, shadow, and everyday rhythms around Ghanta Ghar, Jodhpur.
labWorks.fullDescription: The series studies how morning sun carves alleys, grilles, and cobbles into graphic lines, using negative space and silhouettes to choreograph movement. Narrative frames—like a child pausing at a threshold, a tree rising from a demolition plot, and a carved sentinel watching the bazaar—anchor the geometry in lived emotion. Each image is composed for edge tension and leading lines, favoring available light, high contrast, and restrained tonality to keep attention on gesture and place.
labWorks.challenges: Capturing the essence of Jodhpur's streets in monochrome while maintaining narrative depth and compositional interest.
labWorks.solution: Focused on high-contrast lighting, leading lines, and negative space to create visually striking images that tell stories of everyday life.
labWorks.results: Created a compelling photo series that effectively showcases street photography techniques and the cultural richness of Ghanta Ghar.

labWorks.title: Personal Portfolio Website
labWorks.description: This very website - a modern portfolio built with Next.js and advanced animations.
labWorks.fullDescription: Designed and developed a personal portfolio website showcasing creative and technical projects.
labWorks.challenges: Building a performant, visually appealing portfolio that effectively showcases diverse projects while maintaining fast load times.
labWorks.solution: Leveraged Next.js for server-side rendering, Tailwind for styling, and Framer Motion for smooth animations to create an engaging user experience.
labWorks.results: Successfully deployed a fast, responsive portfolio website that effectively presents projects and skills to potential collaborators and employers.
